SageTVPlugin.Name: BluRay/DVD External Playback
SageTVPlugin.Description: Allows launching an external media player (such as ArcSoft TotalMedia Theater 3) to play DVD and/or BluRay content.
SageTVPlugin.Author: Fuzzy
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: - 1.0.5 - Initial Release - 1.0.6 - Move of the files only to Bintray
